inbox.sql:
select m.*,u.Login, u.Login as Manager,u.UserID,
concat_ws(': ',mt.Name_$lang;,if(m.Subject='' or m.Subject is null,'$message[234];',m.Subject )) as Subject from ut_messages m left outer join sp_question_types mt on mt.TypeID=m.TypeID left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID1
where m.Support=1 and m.Status<2 and (m.UserID2='$auth->user;' or m.UserID2 is null) order by m.Date desc
inbox.action: update ut_messages set Status=3 where MessageID=@MessageID; and @delete;='on' and Support=1 and (UserID2='$auth->user' or UserID2 is null)
inbox.header:
<input type='checkbox' onclick='markall(checked)' >
    

<script>

function markall(checked)
{

    for(i=0;i<document.forms['inbox'].elements.length;i++)
    {
  	var item = document.forms['inbox'].elements[i];
	if(item.type =='checkbox') item.checked = checked;
    }
}

</script>

sent.sql: select m.*,concat(u.FirstName,' ',u.LastName) as User, u.Login as Manager,u.UserID, if(m.Subject='' or m.Subject is null,'$message[234];',m.Subject ) as Subject from ut_messages m left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID2 where m.Support=2 and Status=2 order by m.Date desc

message.select:
select m.*,u.Login,FROM_UNIXTIME(m.Date,'%d.%m.%Y %H:%i') as Date, u.Login as User
from ut_messages m left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID1
where MessageID='$id;' and (Support=2 or (Support=1 and (UserID2 is null or (UserID2='$auth->user;' or UserID1='$auth->user;'))))
